attributes.action: Allow people whith controlled asthma to join the armed forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to allow individuals to be able to join the armed forces who have asthma. We understand that people who have uncontrolled asthma could pose a risk to themselves and others in an army situation. However people who have their asthma under complete control, and who never have severe attacks, should be allowed to join.
